oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Deaf & Dumb Asylum, Civil War
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Deaf & Dumb Asylum, used as a hospital during the Civil War. The building was later used as Knoxville City Hall. 1860s.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Asylums; City & town halls; Civil wars;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Photo File, Subject File, McClung Historical Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number if available and provide a brief description of the photograph.
